posts.name: Rjerk
posts.cooked:

Looks like it’s a bug. @jzhou

posts.name: Jingyu Zhou
posts.cooked: Yes. This bug has been fixed by Fix consistency check crashes [release-7.2] by jzhou77 · Pull Request #9182 · apple/foundationdb · GitHub and will be included in 7.2.4 release.

link_counts.title: Fix consistency check crashes [release-7.2] by jzhou77 · Pull Request #9182 · apple/foundationdb · GitHub

posts.name: Rjerk
posts.cooked: Hope to see the release of this version soon.
